translations: 关税，税款，强缴款项；外加重量（赛马，作为一种让步）；拱墩
通过需付款数来（对进口货物）归类

sentences.sentence: I said that no one has the right to impost his views on others.
sentences.translation: 我说任何人都无权把自己的意见强加于人。

sentences.sentence: Exemption from wharfage dues and any export tax, duty, impost and fees.
sentences.translation: 免除任何码头费及任何出口税、关税、进口税费。

sentences.sentence: Transient immobilization and starvation add to this impost on the skeletal muscle mass.
sentences.translation: 暂时的卧床和饥饿更加重了这种骨胳肌的消耗。
